attr.title: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure
attr.desc: Super Amazing Wagon Adventure is a fast-paced 2d shooting game with a random story. You control a group of three migrants traveling west along a wagon trail. The game consists of short scenes that are sequenced together in a semi-random way to tell a crazy adventure story.
attr.inst: Install portfiles with PM autoinstaller. Buy and install Super Amazing Wagon Adventure. Copy all files to  the "sawa/gamedata" folder.
attr.inst_md:
- Install portfiles with PM autoinstaller.
- Buy and install [Super Amazing Wagon Adventure](https://store.steampowered.com/app/250500/Super_Amazing_Wagon_Adventure/).
- Copy all files to  the "sawa/gamedata" folder.
